import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Ici, vous pouvez ajouter la logique pour envoyer le formulaire console.log('Form data:', formData); }; return (
